subject: refactor(import): remove all type/schema concepts from codebase
body:
The app uses labels and properties — there are no types, schemas,
typeName, typeId, isSystemNode, or isSystemArc. Removed every reference
to these dead concepts across code, tests, and documentation.

Code changes:
- importExportService: removed typeName→label conversion from JSON
  normalization, updated buildLabelsFromRaw to only merge labels+tags
- markdownImportService: removed type: frontmatter→label handling,
  type: in frontmatter is now treated as a regular property
- Cleaned up comments in types/index.ts, factory.ts, snapshotService.ts,
  database.ts, ExportModal.tsx

Test changes:
- Removed typeName conversion tests from importExportService.test.ts
- Updated markdown import tests to use tags: instead of type: for labels

Documentation changes:
- ai-research-output-guide.md: removed Type Assignment section,
  isSystemNode/isSystemArc, schemas, typeName/typeId references
- markdown-import-format.md: removed type: as recognized frontmatter
- CLAUDE.md: removed schema/type references from conventions

Only surviving references are in database.ts v1 migration (required by
Dexie for database upgrade path — cannot be removed).

Tags: import, labels, cleanup, type-removal
Complexity: 3
Urgency: 3
Impact: user-facing
Risk: medium
Debt: paid
Epic: import-compatibility
Semver: minor

title: remove all type/schema concepts from codebase
